metaTitle: Ilias El Mabrak | Expert Web Developer & WordPress Specialist | SEO & Custom Plugins
metaDescription: Ilias El Mabrak is a passionate Web Developer and WordPress Expert specializing in custom themes, plugins, responsive design, and SEO optimization. Let's build your next digital success.
heroDescription: Passionate web developer specializing in creating stunning, responsive websites, custom WordPress solutions, and performance-driven digital experiences that drive results and exceed expectations. I focus on **SEO optimization** and **custom plugin development** to ensure your online presence is both powerful and effective.
aboutParagraph1: I'm a passionate web developer with over 5 years of experience creating digital experiences that make a difference. My journey began with a simple curiosity about how websites work, and it has evolved into a deep expertise in modern web technologies, **front-end development**, and **back-end solutions**.
aboutParagraph2: I specialize in crafting custom **WordPress solutions**, **responsive web designs**, and **performance-optimized websites** that not only look amazing but also deliver exceptional user experiences and rank well on search engines. My focus is on delivering **scalable and secure web development**.
aboutParagraph3: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring the latest web technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing my knowledge with the developer community. I'm committed to continuous learning and delivering **high-quality web solutions**.
skillsSubtitle: Technologies and tools I use to bring ideas to life, from **front-end development** to **WordPress customization** and **SEO strategies**.
skill1Desc: Expert in semantic HTML5 and modern CSS3, including Flexbox, Grid, and responsive design principles for **pixel-perfect web layouts**.
skill2Desc: Proficient in vanilla JavaScript, ES6+, DOM manipulation, and modern frameworks for interactive web experiences and **dynamic content development**.
skill3Desc: Advanced **WordPress development** including custom themes, plugins, and complex site architectures, specializing in **Elementor and ACF integrations**.
skill4Desc: Creating powerful **WordPress plugins** that extend functionality and solve unique business challenges, tailored to specific client needs.
skill5Desc: Designing intuitive and beautiful user interfaces that provide exceptional user experiences and **enhance website usability**.
skill6Desc: Optimizing websites for speed, **search engine optimization (SEO)**, and accessibility to ensure the best possible user experience and **higher search rankings**.
service1Desc: Custom websites built from scratch using modern technologies. Responsive, fast, and optimized for all devices and browsers, delivering **unique online presence**.
service2Desc: Expert **WordPress development** including custom themes, plugins, and complex site functionality tailored to your needs, from **e-commerce to corporate sites**.
service3Desc: Complete **SEO audits** and **on-page/off-page optimization** to improve your website's visibility and ranking in search engines, driving **organic traffic**.
service4Desc: Speed up your website with advanced optimization techniques, caching, and performance monitoring, ensuring **fast loading times** and better user experience.
service5Desc: Mobile-first design approach ensuring your website looks perfect on all devices and screen sizes, providing a **seamless user experience**.
service6Desc: Comprehensive security solutions to protect your website from threats and ensure data integrity, along with **ongoing maintenance and updates**.
project1Desc: Developed a custom **WordPress platform** for SNTL Assurances, enabling online policy subscriptions at attractive rates. This project focused on **secure user experience** and **efficient service delivery**.
project2Desc: Designed and developed the official website for ANRE, a public legal entity with financial autonomy. The site provides comprehensive information on electricity sector regulation, focusing on **transparency and public access to information**.
project3Desc: Developed the online presence for the Regional Investment Center of F√®s-Mekn√®s, a platform dedicated to supporting and facilitating investment projects in the region. Focused on **investor resources and regional development**.
project4Desc: Created a robust website for CHAABI LLD, offering long-term car rental solutions for large enterprises, SMEs, and professionals. The platform streamlines mobility management with **user-friendly interfaces** and **service information**.
project5Desc: Developed the online portal for FBI Formation Brevetage Immobilier, a key player in real estate training. This platform supports their vision to contribute to the economic development through specialized real estate education and **professional certification**.
project6Desc: Created the commercial interface for Arg Immo, a real estate agency in Marrakech. This platform facilitates the buying and selling of properties, offering a seamless experience for clients looking for **real estate opportunities**.
project7Desc: Developed the website for Road X Service, specializing in professional convoyage missions for diverse clients, including individuals and businesses (up to 3.5T). The site provides information on their **logistics and transport services**.
contactDescription: Ready to bring your vision to life? I'd love to hear about your project and discuss how we can create something amazing together, from **custom web development** to **SEO strategies**.
footerDescription: Passionate web developer creating digital experiences that make a difference. Let's build something amazing together, focusing on **WordPress development**, **responsive design**, and **SEO optimization**.
